Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: BundleType

Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: CarePlanActivityKind
Title: Care Plan Activity Kind
Descriptino: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Name: CarePlanActivityOutcome
Title: Care Plan Activity Outcome
Descriptino: Example codes indicating the outcome of a care plan activity. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: CarePlanActivityStatus
Title: CarePlanActivityStatus
Descriptino: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Name: CarePlanCategory

Descriptino: Example codes indicating the category a care plan falls within.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: CarePlanIntent
Title: Care Plan Intent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: CommonTags

Name: ConditionStage

Name: ConditionStageType

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus

Name: ContactEntityType
Title: Contact entity type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

Name: DiagnosisRole
Title: DiagnosisRole
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

Name: AdmitSource
Title: Admit source
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

Name: Diet
Title: Diet
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

Name: DischargeDisposition
Title: Discharge disposition
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to where the patient left the hospital.

Name: EncounterLocationStatus
Title: EncounterLocationStatus
Descriptino: The status of the location.

Name: ParticipantType
Title: Participant type
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

Name: EncounterReasonCodes
Title: Encounter Reason Codes
Descriptino: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

Name: SpecialArrangements
Title: Special arrangements
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

Name: SpecialCourtesy
Title: Special courtesy

Name: EncounterStatus
Title: EncounterStatus
Descriptino: Current state of the encounter.

Name: EncounterType
Title: Encounter type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

Name: HTTPVerb

Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: LocationType
Title: Location type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

Name: ManifestationAndSymptomCodes
Title: Manifestation and Symptom Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Manifestation and Symptom codes.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationAsNeededReasonCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication As Needed Reason Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all clinical findings from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: ParticipantRoles
Title: Participant Roles
Descriptino: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

Name: ProcedureReasonCodes
Title: Procedure Reason Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a reason for a procedure.

Name: RequestIntent
Title: RequestIntent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

Name: RequestPriority
Title: Request priority
Descriptino: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: All Security Labels
Title: SecurityLabels
Descriptino: A single value set for all security labels defined by FHIR.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: ServiceRequestCategoryCodes
Title: Service Request Category Codes
Descriptino: An example value set of SNOMED CT concepts that can classify a requested service

Name: ServiceRequestOrderDetailsCodes
Title: Service Request Order Details Codes
Descriptino: An example value set of Codified order entry details concepts.  These concepts only make sense in the context of what is being ordered.  This example is for a patient ventilation order

Name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
Title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
Descriptino: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

Name: ActEncounterCode
Title: ActEncounterCode
Descriptino: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)

Name: ActPriority
Title: ActPriority
Descriptino: A code or set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency,) specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.    *Discussion:* This attribute is used in orders to indicate the ordered priority, and in event documentation it indicates the actual priority used to perform the act. In definition mood it indicates the available priorities.

Name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Descriptino: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
